features.featureTitle: In the ContactCTA component, update the email address displayed in the contact info card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]) to 'saravana@espiritdecrops.com'. Also update any mailto: href associated with this email to use the same address.

In the ContactCTA component, update the phone number displayed in the contact info card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]/div[2]/div[2]) to '+91 7259145275'. Also update any tel: href associated with this phone to use the same number.

In the ContactCTA component, update the location/address text displayed in the contact info card (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[7]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]) to 'Bangalore â€“ All India Remote Available'.
